title: Events and Services
description: The Green and Digital Office regularly organizes and supports various educational and scientific events

eventTypes.title: Training Seminars and Workshops
eventTypes.description: Practical sessions on environmental management and digital technologies

eventTypes.title: Lectures by International Experts
eventTypes.description: Meetings with leading specialists in the field of sustainable development

eventTypes.title: Round Tables and Discussions
eventTypes.description: Discussion of current issues in ecology and digitalization of education

eventTypes.title: Student Initiatives
eventTypes.description: Support for student projects and ideas on sustainable development

calendar.title: Event Calendar
calendar.description: The event calendar is updated on an ongoing basis. Follow current information about upcoming seminars, workshops, and meetings.
